name: Are Ya Winning Son?
description:
Note: The game is still in development. You can play the demo level below.

------------------------------------------------------------------->

'Are ya winning Son' is a Top-Down Shooter featuring "Big Daddy," the dad obviously, who is on his mission to find his son.

The game is set in his house, where the bullies are trying to stop Son from winning. You start at the Dad's workspace where he realises that he must check to see if his Son is winning. In the demo, you can try exploring the bottom level of the game, which consists of the Living Room, the Kitchen and Dad's workspace. You can explore the level and try to defeat the enemies. 

The final build of the game consists of the following features:

- 2 more levels with a Boss battle at the end.

- Quantum Console integration

- More A.I. agents with some cover to protect yourself from them. 

- Slow-motion action on-demand.

- More weapons.

- Healing items.

- Better Menu System.

- Controller integration.

-Mobile Controls.

- The Son. + More!

------------------------------------------------------------------->

Misc. :

Made for the 'One Shot Game-Jam.'

Made using Unity 2020 and TopDown Engine by MoreMountains. 

------------------------------------------------------------------->
